price: Sai waɗanda suke sayar da rayuwar dũniya su karɓi ta Lãhira su yi yãƙi, a cikin hanyar Allah. Kuma wanda ya yi yãki a cikin hanyar Allah to a kashe shi ko kuwa ya rinjãya, sa'an nan zã Mu ba shi ijãra mai girma.
arabic: ۞ فَلۡيُقَٰتِلۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَشۡرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَمَن يُقَٰتِلۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَيُقۡتَلۡ أَوۡ يَغۡلِبۡ فَسَوۡفَ نُؤۡتِيهِ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falyuqātil fī sabīli al-lahi alladhīna yashrūna al-ḥayata al-dun'yā bil-ākhirati waman yuqātil fī sabīli al-lahi fayuq'tal aw yaghlib fasawfa nu'tīhi ajran ʿaẓīman
